sqlMap.select:
select * from ( select rownum as rn, t.* from ( select id, userid, token, clientip, actionid, actionresult, logtime, logcontent, hashcode, domainid, domainname, orgunitid, orgunitname, moduletype, vendorid, serverip from otppms_loginfo where 1=1
order by id desc) t where rownum < = #endRow#) tt where rn > #startRow# order by id desc
